Title: Prohibits the use of automated purchasing software to buy large quantities of goods for the purpose of retail resale
Summary: Prohibits the use of automated purchasing software to buy large quantities of goods for the purpose of retail resale of such goods.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L; amd ยง94-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the executive law, in relation to automated purchasing software
